name: MrNiceGuy
description:
Pov: Mr. Stark, I don't feel so good,

Your not spider-man but you are a serial killer who has a "talk" with a familiar related

person. He might torture you with making your nightmares come alive but hey, its for your crimes, hey that rhymes. Anyway this game was made with project help: bypell https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC8WaX9olTHItWEqULDx8FUQ

thx 

another anyway he hates the light
